QueryResult.text: SELECT I.ID INVESTMENT_ID, MLC.DESCRIPTION COST_L_MATRIX, MLR.DESCRIPTION RATE_L_MATRIX, MXC.DESCRIPTION COST_X_MATRIX, MXR.DESCRIPTION RATE_X_MATRIX, MMC.DESCRIPTION COST_M_MATRIX, MMR.DESCRIPTION RATE_M_MATRIX, MQC.DESCRIPTION COST_Q_MATRIX, MQR.DESCRIPTION RATE_Q_MATRIX FROM inv_investments I LEFT OUTER JOIN nameoptions N ON 1=1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ppa_matrix MLC ON N.TRANSCOSTSRCLBR = MLC.MATRIXKEY LEFT OUTER JOIN ppa_matrix MLR ON N.TRANSRATESRCLBR = MLR.MATRIXKEY LEFT OUTER JOIN ppa_matrix MXC ON N.TRANSCOSTSRCMTL = MXC.MATRIXKEY LEFT OUTER JOIN ppa_matrix MXR ON N.TRANSCOSTSRCMTL = MXR.MATRIXKEY LEFT OUTER JOIN ppa_matrix MMC ON N.TRANSCOSTSRCEXPENSE = MMC.MATRIXKEY LEFT OUTER JOIN ppa_matrix MMR ON N.TRANSCOSTSRCEXPENSE = MMR.MATRIXKEY LEFT OUTER JOIN ppa_matrix MQC ON N.TRANSCOSTSRCEQUIP = MQC.MATRIXKEY LEFT OUTER JOIN ppa_matrix MQR ON N.TRANSCOSTSRCEQUIP = MQR.MATRIXKEY WHERE (1=1)
